channel.title: sunset on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in sunset on The B0ardside

item.title: Sunset Sketchers Group Show 2021
item.description: Woop! Got an awesome new backyard show coming up, Saturday and Sunday March 27/28 - Sunset Sketchers Annual Group Show, 2021. Group show for the Sunset Sketchers, with a ton of great art, and I’m particularly excited for some model installations by Thomas Beutel! We have two amazing bands playing, one on each day from 3pm - Cindy and China Come along!

item.title: Let's Talk About The Sunset
item.description: Awesome wee vid of my neighborhood!

item.title: The B0ardside in The Million Dollar Mailbox
item.description: Ah, super lovely review of My Side Of The City and The B0ardside #1 from my buddy Dan Shahin .. This is taken from a longer livestream here. thanks Dan!

item.title: My Side Of The City
item.description: Finished a comic I’ve been working on this past year - over at the Drawing B0ard -
